Plot: May, 1946, in Paris young poet Jacques Prevel meets Antonin Artaud, the actor, artist, and writer just released from a mental asylum. Over ten months, we follow the mad Artaud from his ...
Title: En compagnie d'Antonin Artaud
Writer: Gérard Mordillat, Jacques Prevel (book), Jérôme Prieur
Actors: Sami Frey, Marc Barbé, Julie Jézéquel, Valérie Jeannet
